name: Soul Trapping Camera
description:
Soul Trapping Camera is a relic from the other realm. 
It took a form of analogue camera with golden eye as its lens. 
Rumour said that the relic has been used to capture evil spirits back then. 
Now whoever has it is will possess the soul trapping power,
be it good or bad. 

inspired by Yu-Gi-oh's millennium items

animated illustration

5 seconds video
520 px X520 px
